description: Unbatch an organization invoices batch invoice.
permissions: Allowed for admin users, or for users who can update the related organization invoices batch (OrganizationInvoicesBatchPolicy#update?).
side_effects: Creates an organization invoices batch invoice unbatching and transitions the batch invoice status to skipped.
validation_notes: Requires --organization-invoices-batch-invoice. The referenced organization invoices batch invoice must exist. The batch invoice must currently have status successful or failed; otherwise the action is invalid. Example flags: --organization-invoices-batch-invoice 123, --comment "Unbatching for correction".
